content: करुण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [करोति मनः आनुकूल्याय, कृउनन् <ls>Tv.</ls>] Tender, pathetic, pitiable, exciting pity, mournful; करुणध्वनिः <ls>V. 1</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 67</ls>; विकलकरुणैरार्यचरितैः <ls>U. 1. 28.</ls> --णः {@--1@} Pity, compassion, tenderness. {@--2@} Pathetic sentiment, grief, sorrow (as one of the 8 or {9} sentiments); पुटपाकप्रतीकाशो रामस्य करुणो रसः <ls>U. 3. 1</ls>, <ls n="U. 3.">13</ls>; <ls n="U. 3.">7.</ls> <ls n="U. 3.">12</ls>; विलपन्… करुणार्थग्रथितं प्रियां प्रति <ls>R. 8. 70.</ls> {@--3@} The supreme being. {@--4@} A Jaina saint. --णं <ab>Ved.</ab> An action, a holy or sacred rite.
